title: Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

+ The user has selected the Games segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user observes the Games tab
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Users will be able to view today's games 

AND

+ Scores and limited stats will be available

title: Games Calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

+ The user has selected the Games segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user observes the Games segment

AND

+ The user taps on the date above the game tiles
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able to navigate to a different date

AND

+ The game tiles listed are from the correct date

AND

+ The user is also able to change the dates on the Games EPG by tapping on the (<) or (>) buttons above the game tiles

title: Game Tile Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into an mlb.tv account

AND

+ The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

+ The user has selected the Games segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user observes the Games segment

AND

+ The user taps on a game tile
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe successful playback of the selected game

AND

+ The user will observe a blackout message if a team is in-market

title: Watch Now
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

+ The user has selected the Watch Now segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user has navigated to the Watch Now segment
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe a Hero Game Tile, Games Carousel, Minor League Baseball carousel where applicable (Favorited Team), Featured content, and VOD content.

title: Watch Now Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

+ The user has selected the Watch Now segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the Hero Image & Tile at the top of the Watch Now segment
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user may observe:
- Live or archived games (MLB)
- SVOD content (Carded)
- SLive content (MiLB, Big Inning, High Heat)
- FLive content (Ex: WS Parade)

title: Watch Now Games Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

+ The user has selected the Watch Now segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the Games Carousel under the hero
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe:
- Today's games that are in Preview, Live, or Final
- Scores and stats within the game tile
- Deeplink into video playback (If Entitled)

title: Watch Now Mixed Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Watch Tab

AND

+ The user has selected the Watch Now segment in the top bar
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the Mixed Content Carousels under the hero
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Users observe the following carousels and more:
- Most Popular VOD
- Favorited Team's Most Popular VOD
- MLB Top Plays VOD
- Recaps VOD 
- Get Caught Up VOD
- MLB Network VOD
- Featured on MLB.tv SVOD
- MLB Documentaries SVOD

title: Game Hero Background Image- Proxy required
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Watch Now Tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN their favorite team's game is featured in the hero
AND Hide Spoilers is OFF
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background image should be sourced from the current:favorite image

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN their favorite team's game is not featured in the hero
AND their following team's game is featured in the hero
AND Hide Spoilers is OFF
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background image should be sourced from the current:following image

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN their favorite team's game is not featured in the hero
AND their following team's game is  not featured in the hero
AND Hide Spoilers is OFF
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background image should be sourced from the current:home image

custom_steps_separated.content:
NOT CURRENTLY IMPLEMENTED:
WHEN their favorite team's game is featured in the hero
AND Hide Spoilers is ON
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background image should be sourced from the fallback:favorite image

custom_steps_separated.content:
NOT CURRENTLY IMPLEMENTED:
WHEN their favorite team's game is not featured in the hero
AND their following team's game is featured in the hero
AND Hide Spoilers is ON
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background image should be sourced from the fallback:following image

custom_steps_separated.content:
NOT CURRENTLY IMPLEMENTED:
WHEN their favorite team's game is not featured in the hero
AND their following team's game is  not featured in the hero
AND Hide Spoilers is ON
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background image should be sourced from the fallback:home image

title: MLB Network Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is logged into an account with MVPD authorization linked

AND

+ The user has navigated to the Watch tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user taps on the MLB Network segment
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive playback of the MLB Network live stream

AND

+ The "On Now" and "Coming Up" calendar are available to view

title: Search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Watch tab

AND

+ The user has tapped on the Search segment
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user observes the content available on the Search segment
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe buttons at the top bar which include:

- Search Feature (Magnifying Glass)
- Channels Options (Squares)
- Create a Reel feature (Play Button Rectangle)

AND

+ VOD carousels that can be selected

AND

+ Category tiles that can be selected

title: Search Content Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Watch tab

AND

+ The user has tapped on the Search segment
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user observes the content available on the Search segment

AND

+ The user taps on a VOD tile to launch video playback
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be navigated to the Film Room playlist player 

AND

+ Playback for the selected content will successfully begin

title: "Film Room" Search Results
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Watch tab

AND

+ The user has tapped on the Search segment
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user taps on the Search feature (Magnifying glass) from the top nav options of Film Room
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able to search for specific keywords

AND

+ Relevant results to the user's search are generated 

AND

+ The user receives successful playback when selecting content to launch from the search results

title: EPG Game Tiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Games segment under the Watch page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the game tiles available on the Games segment (Example: February 26th, 2024)
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe the game time,  Away Team over Home Team, Game Status (Inning, Delay), Game Data (Live, Archive, etc.), Logos, and Team nicknames in the game tile.

title: EPG Calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Games segment under the Watch page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user utilizes the calendar feature by tapping on < or > to change days

OR

+ The user utilizes the calendar feature by tapping the date to display the full monthly calendar
custom_expected:
THEN

+ All buttons should navigate the user to a different date

AND

+ Tapping Today will navigate the user to today's game page EPG

title: EPG Logos
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Games segment under the Watch page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the game tiles on the Games segment
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The user should view proper and up-to-date team logos

AND

+ The team nicknames should be displayed next to the associated logo

AND

+ The away team should be displayed above the home team

title: EPG Game Status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Games segment under the Watch page
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user views the Game tiles displayed on the segment page
custom_expected:
THEN 

The user can view various game status' such as 

- Postponed
- Suspended
- Delay (and reason)
- Canceled
- No-Hitter
- Perfect Game

title: EPG Game Info
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Games segment under the Watch page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user observes the game tiles on the EPG segment
custom_expected:
THEN 

The user will see specific Game Info such as:

 - Time of First Pitch
 - Current Top/Bottom/Middle of Inning
 - Warm Up
 - Final

title: EPG Game Launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Games segment under the Watch page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user taps on an archived or live game tile
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will receive successful playback (Given proper entitlements)

title: EPG Messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Games segment under the Watch page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch a stream with no broadcasts attached

+ The user attempts to launch a stream that they are not entitled to

+ The user attempts to launch a stream without any wifi/cellular connection

+ The user attempts to launch a stream during a state where the app is not responding
custom_expected:
THEN

+ An MLB.TV message is displayed stating that the game has no available video feeds.

+ The MLB.tv paywall will display for users to upgrade their entitlements (Yearly/Monthly)

+ The user will receive an error message stating an issue occurred, and to restart the app or try again later.

+ The user will receive a Video Error message stating an issue occurred when trying to play the video, and to restart the app or try again later.

title: EPG Game Type
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Games segment under the Watch page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user observes the game tiles for games scheduled for that day
custom_expected:
THEN

The user can determine which stream will be launched, such as:

- Exhibition (Non-MLB teams)
- Spring Training (Split-Squad teams)
- MVPD (ASG Logos)
- Partner Games (Peacock, AppleTV+)
- Free Game of the Day (Banner)

title: EPG App Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Games segment under the Watch page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to another area of the app such as Scores, News, Home from the bottom menu options

AND

+ The user then again taps the Watch tab from the bottom menu options
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Games page should display 

AND

+ The date the user left the Games segment on should be the same. 

Ex: Left on 4/27/23, returned to 4/27/23 and not Today.
